The asymmetric unit of [Ag(imidH)2.3(CH3CN)0.7](9-aca) (3) showing the disorder of one imidH with CH3CN.

Weak interactions of the silver(I) centre with the carboxylate oxygen atoms and the H-bonding between the imidazole N-H and carboxylate oxygens in [Ag(imidH)2.3(CH3CN)0.7](9-aca) (3). The disordered solvate ligand has been omitted for clarity and H-bonds are represented by dashed lines.

For prophylactic treatment, the test compound was administered 1 h prior to infection with C. albicans cells, while for the treatment of infection experiments the compound was administered 1 h after infection with C. albicans. Survival of G. mellonella larvae 72 h after being infected with a lethal dose of C. albicans (2 × 106 fungal cells). For prophylactic treatment, the test compound was administered 1 h prior to infection with C. albicans cells, while for the treatment of infection experiments the compound was administered 1 h after infection with C. albicans. Compounds tested were AgNO3, ketoconazole and 1-7. All compounds were administered at two different concentrations (100 μg cm-3 and 2 × MIC100 concentration in μg cm-3).

Fig. 12 Survival of G. mellonella larvae 72 h after being infected with a lethal dose of C. albicans (2 × 106 fungal cells). For prophylactic treatment, the test compound was administered 1 h prior to infection with C. albicans cells, while for the treatment of infection experiments the compound was administered 1 h after infection with C. albicans. Compounds tested were AgNO3, ketoconazole and 1–7. All compounds were administered at two different concentrations (100 μg cm−3 and 2 × MIC100 concentration in μg cm−3).

For prophylactic treatment, the test compound was administered 1 h prior to infection with C. albicans cells, while for the treatment of infection experiments the compound was administered 1 h after infection with C. albicans. Compounds tested were AgNO3, ketoconazole and 1-7. All compounds were administered at two different concentrations (100 μg cm-3 and 2 × MIC100 concentration in μg cm-3).

metadata.title: Silver( i ) complexes of 9-anthracenecarboxylic acid and imidazoles : synthesis, structure and antimicrobial activity
